commit-message-validator.errorMessage:
Please provide the commit message in the following format.
	<standard_convention>(<jira_ticket>): <msg> 
Standard conventions(type) must be one of [build, chore, ci, docs, feature, fix, improvement, perf, refactor, revert, style, test]

Example: feature(CD-1124): Adds commit message lints

Find more details https://confluence.productmadness.com/display/PMCA/Husky+githoooks+and+Commit+Lint+through+ci-plugin-client
